member.name: IN6_ADDR
member.summary: The IN6_ADDR structure specifies an IPv6 transport address.

member.name: IN6_ADDR.u
member.summary: A union that contains the following different representations of the IPv6 transport address:

member.name: IN6_ADDR.u.Byte
member.summary: An array that contains 16 UCHAR-typed values.

member.name: IN6_ADDR.u.Word
member.summary: An array that contains eight USHORT-typed values.
